ISEBE LEZONXIBELELWANO: UBUME






UBUME



USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Injongo yeSebe lezoQhagamshelwano kukuqulunqa imigaqo-nkqubo nokuqinisekisa ukusetyenziswa kwayo kwiinkonzo zoqhagamshelwano ngomnxeba, ezeeposi nosasazo. Likwalawula nodluliselo:
* kwiqumrhu leePosi zoMzantsi Afrika
* kwiZiko loSasazo loMzantsi Afrika
* kwiqumrhu lolawulo loqhagamshelwano ngomnxeba, i-Independent Communications Authorty of South Africa
* kwiqumrhu loMzantsi Afrika elijongene namajelo eendaba asebenza ngezilektronika, i-National Electronic Media Institution of South Africa.
* kwi-Universal Service Agency


Eli Sebe linenjongo:
* yokuphucula umgangatho wobomi babo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika
* yokwenza uMzantsi Afrika ibe lilizwe elinoluntu oluqamele ngolwazi
* yokuncedisa ekumiselweni koqoqosho lwezengcaciso


Oku kuya kuphunyezwa ngokuthi kumiselwe uluntu olunxibelelenayo ngezengcaciso ukuze abantu baxhotyiswe ngamandla kwiindlela abasebenza ngazo nangokwenza
